subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which king founded the city of Jaipur?
question_hi: जयपुर के निवास और इसके प्राप्त अधिकारी
explanation_en: Rao Jodha, a Rajput chieftain, founded the city of Jaipur in 1727. Jaipur was originally named after him as Amber, but later the name was changed to Jaipur.
explanation_hi: राव जोधा, एक Rajput ठिकाना खिले गया Jaipur केलाया गया 1727 के दिन बने। Jaipur प्रान्त, वह प्राचार्यांकां सिंग, केलाया गया Jaipur केलाया गया गया केलाया गया गया गया गया गया गया गया गया गया गया गया गया गया गया गया गया गया गया गया गया गया गया गया गया गया गया गया गया गया
explanation_en: Jaipur, established by Sawai Raja Jai Singh II, was founded in 1727. He chose this location due to its favorable geographical and strategic advantages.

explanation_en: Jaipur was founded by Sawai Man Singh Ki Devra in 1494 AD. However, Jai Singh II, also known as Sawai Man Singh, started the construction of the city in 1494 AD.
